plot: In this Anglicized rendering of the Turgenev play, Susannah York toys with the affections of a young admirer while spending a month at a country estate.
title: A Month in the Country
plot_es: In this Anglicized rendering of the Turgenev play, Susannah York toys with the affections of a young admirer while spending a month at a country estate.
plot_en: In this Anglicized rendering of the Turgenev play, Susannah York toys with the affections of a young admirer while spending a month at a country estate.
